mapper.sql: id, user_id, travel_style, budget_range, preferred_transport, preferred_accommodation, dietary_preference, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_preference (user_id, travel_style, budget_range, preferred_transport, preferred_accommodation, dietary_preference) VALUES (#{userId}, #{travelStyle}, #{budgetRange}, #{preferredTransport}, #{preferredAccommodation}, #{dietaryPreference})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_preference SET travel_style = #{travelStyle}, budget_range = #{budgetRange}, preferred_transport = #{preferredTransport}, preferred_accommodation = #{preferredAccommodation}, dietary_preference = #{dietaryPreference}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
